doc:
Bob Haymes https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bob_Haymes 0 Robert William Haymes (March 29, 1923 – January 27, 1989), also known by the stage names Robert Stanton and Bob Stanton, was an American singer, songwriter, actor and radio and television host. He is best remembered for co-writing the song "That's All", part of the Great American Songbook. He was the younger brother of singer and actor Dick Haymes. Robert_William_Haymes ( March_29_,_1923 – January_27_,_1989 ) , also_known by the_stage_names_Robert_Stanton and Bob_Stanton , was an_American_singer , songwriter , actor_and_radio_and_television_host . He is_best_remembered for co-writing the_song " That 's All_" , part of the_Great_American_Songbook . He was the_younger_brother of singer_and_actor_Dick_Haymes .
